gallery.subtitle: Discover the unique and vibrant world of Scheve Schilder's artwork

about.title: About the Artist
about.subtitle: Discover the story behind Scheve Schilder's unique artistic journey

story.title: My Story
story.paragraph1: Welcome to my artistic world! I'm Scheve Schilder, a passionate artist from the Netherlands.
story.paragraph2: Through my work, I aim to bring joy and inspiration to people's lives.

style.title: My Artistic Style
style.description: My work spans various mediums including oil paintings, watercolors, and mixed media.
